content: I'm feeling the need to display structured content in an IG, using a template. Normally in Jekyll that can be done via front matter. Who has experience with that? @Eric Haas I think you have done something like that?
structured content = structured data but not necessarily FHIR resources
Sadly Lloyd has banished front matter, since it messed up xhtml validation.
I would import from another framework - render it there and add as a page here
